text: 19:20: Dng 13:1-18  Biidiie pha chaigthek hanyie è ai moe shii buangthek rek pha chiih-è buii ibeymuthung shii phatheg hà noh dun ro. (Hì ne ji pha buangthek re-è hanyie è buii ibeymuthung pha cheb rek yi ne chiih-è buii ibeymuthung ro jangbang shii misiasia yi pha khinrin pha ji ro.) Buii ibeymuthung nane biidiie chaig shii ne isieng barud rog shii bai pha khabang pha jihà fen muii.
